body_html:
Ok, I added additional test variable options (learning rates, gradients, number of ADADELTA steps) in order to find a use case where the previously broken code fails and the newly patch code passes.

I also rewrote the test to use loops over variables to reduce the amount of repeated code.

body:
Ok, I added additional test variable options (learning rates, gradients, number of ADADELTA steps) in order to find a use case where the previously broken code fails and the newly patch code passes.

I also rewrote the test to use loops over variables to reduce the amount of repeated code.
